peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is there an app to identify antique pottery?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Discover the history hidden in your treasures with Antique Identifier by Picture, your ultimate tool for identifying antiques and vintage items in just a snap. Powered by advanced AI technology, this app allows you to effortlessly uncover the secrets behind your finds.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: RelicSnap - Antique Identifier on the App Store

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do I identify my pottery mark?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Some common marks include the studio where the piece was made, the potter who crafted the piece, and the signature of the artist who decorated it. A form number and identification of the clay type may also be included. Reference books can help you identify unfamiliar marks.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: How to Identify Art and Studio Pottery

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do you identify ancient pottery?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
After establishing the material and technique used to create the piece, the three best ways to identify an antique are by establishing its shape, decoration, glaze and most importantly of all, its markings. These will usually give a rough indication as to the time period and place of production.
May 16, 2022
